extendedInfo.description: The CCH Tax Rates and Tables 2013 mobile application provides key information frequently used to prepare federal tax forms. CCH Tax Rates and Tables contains the federal income tax rates for 2012 and 2013, the tax tables for 2008 through 2012 as well as other tax rates. Additional information includes tax credit and deduction amounts, EIC amounts, business deductions, rules for retirement and health care plans, selected depreciation tables, and coverage of estate and gift tax rates.
